Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 45th overall pick, by Cleveland in 2010...
Injured on 8/1/2014 with a Inflamed Achilles Tendon, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from Cleveland to Baltimore on 1/31/2015 (Going to CLE: P I. Kennedy, P W. LeBlanc, P G. Richards, P C. Perez. Going to BAL: C K. Deglan)...
Had first career hit on 4/4/2017, off JP Howell (NYA)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/6/2017, off Philip Humber (NYA)...
Injured on 4/15/2018 with a Dislocated Shoulder, out for 4 weeks...
